org.sd.nlp
Class StringWrapper

java.lang.Object
  org.sd.nlp.StringWrapper

public class StringWrapper
extends java.lang.Object

Thread-safe wrapper around a string to make normalization, tokenization, and comparisons more efficient.

Author:
Spence Koehler

getLongestSubString

public final StringWrapper.SubString getLongestSubString(int index,
                                                         int maxSoftBreaks)
Get the longest subString starting at (or after) the given index.

Parameters:
index - the index to start from.
maxSoftBreaks - the maximum number of soft breaks (i.e. max number of words). 0 for no limit.
Returns:
a subString or null.
